item.description: About Hi, I’m John. Here is some relevant (and possibly irrelevant) information about me: I am based in Brooklyn, NY. I have an interest in physically based shading, parallel algorithms, VFX, and technical art. I am currently a Senior Graphics Engineer at Unity Technologies, working on the High-Definition Render Pipeline. What I love about real-time computer graphics is how it forces our hand, as developers, to reconcile the physics of light transport with tight hardware constraints; resulting in clever ideas, and great engineering.
